channel.title: Need help removing MD5
channel.description:
I need help to remove MD5 from my server, Because It's getting annoying.
I need to log on someones account to check things that I can also see in files but then I have to go on my account to check the item id and what it is and it's really annoying.
Can somebody please tell me how to remove MD5.
Thanks - Monkey Money30

item.title: Need help removing MD5
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

I tried to do that and it just comes up with

client.java:16300: cannot find symbol symbol : method passHash(java.lang.String) location: class client int loadgame = loadgame(playerName, passHash(playerPass) ); ^ client.java:16517: cannot find symbol symbol : method passHash(java.lang.String) location: class client characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(pl ayerPass) ^ client.java:16517: cannot find symbol symbol : method passHash(java.lang.String) location: class client characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(pl ayerPass) ^ 3 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

Then I put it back and it comes up with the same thing like this:

client.java:14263: illegal start of expression public String passHash(String password) { ^ 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

make sure you didnt delete an extra } when you removed it

item.title: Need help removing MD5
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Well.

I stuffed it up. It wont compile I removed the MD5 thing and then it wont compile proply it says.

client.java:14263: illegal start of expression public boolean pickUpItem(int item, int amount) { ^ 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

But I tried to add it back in… and it says

client.java:14263: illegal start of expression public String passHash(String password) { ^ 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Need help removing MD5
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_Dibiase Kyle_Dibiase
item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

Well i use dodian, and theres a method in my client.java

public String passHash(String password) { String saltM = new MD5("bakatool").compute(); String passM = new MD5(password).compute(); return new MD5(saltM + passM).compute(); }

all you have to do is remove that

Read full topic

item.title: Need help removing MD5
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_Dibiase Kyle_Dibiase
item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

MD5 is only in a server to encrypt passwords, not items, so your saying you want to remove the password encryption?

Read full topic
